item.title: Need noclip command 317 server
item.dc:creator: @I1_Sn1p3r_I1 I1 Sn1p3r I1
item.description:
@I1_Sn1p3r_I1 wrote:

[quote=“Scape-JAVA, post:5, topic:365151”]Input strings are client sided.

[code=java]
if(inputString.equals("::noclip")) {
for(int k1 = 0; k1 < 4; k1++) {
for(int i2 = 1; i2 < 103; i2++) {
for(int k2 = 1; k2 < 103; k2++)
aClass11Array1230[k1].anIntArrayArray294[i2][k2] = 0;

	}
}

}[/code]
^Input string.[/quote]

Does this go in the client.java (client sided)? if so, where at?
